mapper.select: SELECT P_CODE, P_NAME, P_IPRICE, P_OPRICE, P_VAT FROM tbl_product
SELECT P_CODE, P_NAME, P_IPRICE, P_OPRICE, P_VAT FROM tbl_product WHERE P_CODE = #{p_code}
SELECT P_CODE, P_NAME, P_IPRICE, P_OPRICE, P_VAT FROM tbl_product WHERE P_NAME LIKE '%' || #{p_name} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_product ( P_CODE, P_NAME, P_IPRICE, P_OPRICE, P_VAT ) VALUES ( #{p_code}, #{p_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_iprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_oprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_vat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
